item.title: [439] NINTENDO OWNS FLYING: PALWORLD CHANGE CONFIRMED
item.description:
>Pocketpair said that with the implementation of Patch v0.5.5 this week, “we must make yet another compromise”.
>“From this patch onward, gliding will be performed using a glider rather than with Pals. Pals in the player’s team will still provide passive buffs to gliding, but players will now need to have a glider in their inventory in order to glide.
https://www.videogameschronicle.com/news/palworld-confirms-disappointing-game-changes-forced-by-pokemon-lawsuit/

Holy shit, removing pal balls was bad enough, now you can't fly on your pokemon either

item.title: [ 30] /tpg/ /rcg/ - Theme Park & Roller Coaster General
item.description:
Disneyland Abu Dhabi Edition

>Last Thread: >>2779327

>What is this thread? Why are there two companies?
Disney parks were initially founded as a way to celebrate the culture and history of America and provide middle class families with a fun-filled immersive experience. While theme parks are the main focus of these threads (and the title of the general) there is also discussion on other roller coasters & rides, as well as the parks themselves and trip planning too. That's where /rcg/ comes in.
>Can I talk about Disney/Universal parks in this thread?
Absolutely! Disney and Universal are currently competing for the Orlando theme park market and beyond! Universal is opening new resorts all around the US and new continents!

Thread Pro Tip: Talk about theme parks!

Park Crowd Tracker:
>https://queue-times.com/en-US/parks

Roller Coaster Database:
>https://rcdb.com/

Amusement Park News Sites:
>https://www.themeparkinsider.com/
>https://www.screamscape.com/
>https://www.coaster101.com/

Disney Park News:
>https://www.wdwnt.com/
>https://www.wdwmagic.com/
>https://www.allears.net
>https://www.mousesteps.com

>News
Disneyland Abu Dhabi announced as Disney's 7th resort and first in Middle East. Miral Group (United Arab Emirates government) will entirely fund and operate the park
https://disneyparksblog.com/disney-experiences/disney-announces-abu-dhabi-theme-park/
Epic Universe officially opens in two weeks, but previews are showing heavy operational issues
https://wdwnt.com/2025/05/breaking-harry-potter-and-the-battle-at-the-ministry-to-temporarily-close-during-final-week-of-epic-universe-previews/
And your local theme parks are probably open for weekends now

Original filename: ez4bec5fe33c4.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [ 65] How to deal with s***** tenants as a Chad landlord
item.description:
This fucking dickhead. This guy applied to our rental and stated on his application that he has no pets. Then right when I send him the lease to sign, he says he actually has two emotional support animals and that we can’t deny them. And he’s right. He already has my emails saying his application was approved, so if we pull back the lease, he can forward those emails to a lawyer and we’d easily get fined $16,000 plus fees for the lawyer. Fucking dick.

Original filename: Screenshot_20250507_165235_Photos.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [219] AI Pokemon Thread /NAPT/ Thread 183: Hot for Teacher Edition
item.description:
This is a general thread for people to post their AI art, and make requests from others who may want to attempt making their own Pokemon related gens.

NovelAI is a paid AI generator. Opus tier users have "unlimited" Small/Normal generations, though editing tools require credits.

Microsoft's Bing AI is a free image generator that is powered by DALL·E 3.

Civitai is free using its ‘buzz’ currency. You get about 50 every day plus more for liking models and gens.
>civitai.com

Otaiku is a (mostly) free mobile app. An ad watch is required between each image generation unless you pay.
>ailla.biz/otaiku

Tensor is free to use as well, although you are limited to how many gens you can make per day.
>https://tensor.art/

Local Generation using Stable Diffusion requires a decent video card. Guides for local genning can be found in the /g/ threads:
>>>/g/sdg
>>>/g/ldg
Other Stable Diffusion threads are on: /h/, /e/, /d/, /b/, /vt/, /aco/, /trash/

Hailuo AI takes uploaded art and animates them based on the prompts you get. You get a 3-day free trial, followed by roughly 3 free gens a day afterward. Subscription plans are available.
>https://hailuoai.video/

Pastebin of Pokemon artists:
>https://pastebin.com/U0mmK3Tm (embed)

Characters with under 300 images will require more tags to have them look correct. This is a list of all Pokemon characters with over 300 images:
>https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts?tags=*_%28pokemon%29+&z=5

If you plan on sharing multiple images together, we'd recommend posting just one, and give links for the rest. This way we can conserve space.

This is a locally run html tool provided by ThatOneAiAnon. It keeps track of all artists you like and turns Danbooru's entire tag system in a collapsible list of buttons. You can edit all the js, css, html code to modify the tool. (Ask him for updated versions or more Nai4 tools)
>mega .nz/file/67xwTRSB#m0fPUmJRaWd3oh47gt6nw2LKNMe820TaiKdXTAhx8tI

Previous Thread:>>57751991

Original filename: 1746379542441315.png

item.title: [100] Millennial cuisine has been defined by shallow gimmicks, a very faux sentimenta
item.description:
Millennial cuisine has been defined by shallow gimmicks, a very faux sentimentality, and trying to reinvent the wheel (look to the burger/pizza restaurants they open) . Seemingly all of these things have led to a toxic culture of shallow presentation and verbose moralizing. Nothing good or great has come out of it other then the circus freaks who call themselves chiefs.
What will Zoomer cosine look like? I don't reckon it will be as gaudy or preachy as the Millennial but I am in no high hopes of any sort of major change. Ideally there will be a pre-1970 French cuisine revival but I won't hold my breath.

Original filename: gross.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [155] Trump lies with another big fat lie
item.description:
Trump continues his regressive propaganda campaign with more lies about foreign government deals, using excuses paid for by billionaires
https://www.motherjones.com/politics/2025/05/trump-org-foreign-real-estate-deals-unconstitutional-business-ethics-conflict-interest/
Trump Promised No New Business Deals With Foreign Governments. He Lied.
His family’s real estate deals put the president in direct conflict with the Constitution.

released an “ethics agreement” detailing how he would handle his personal business interests while in the White House. It is remarkably weak and does not require Trump to divest any of his holdings. Unlike a similar agreement for his first term, it does not prohibit the Trump Organization from striking new deals abroad while Trump is president. Instead, it simply prohibits the Trump Organization from striking deals directly with foreign governments.

Trump’s second-term ethics agreement is such a permissive document that it is challenging to find a way to violate it. But three months into his presidency, Trump has found a way.

Last Thursday, the Trump Organization struck a deal to build a $5.5 billion Trump International Golf Club in Qatar. To develop the project, the Trump Organization is partnering with Dar Global, a Saudi Arabian company, and Qatari Diar, a company owned by the Qatari government. Qatari Diar was established by Qatar’s sovereign wealth fund in 2005. Its stated purpose is to “coordinate the country’s real estate development priorities.”

Original filename: Trump-Excuses-58b8dc005f9b58af5c8f8e91.jpg
item.author: Anonymous

item.title: [198] /fwt/ - Friendly Windows Thread
item.description:
FAQ:
>How do I activate Windows?
github.com/massgravel/Microsoft-Activation-Scripts
HWID2 generates and registers a permanent legitimate license on MS's activation servers
Usage: paste into Powershell, run.
irm https://get.activated.win | iex

>and Office?
Same method, use Ohook
You can also use Office.com if your needs are very minimal
or try OnlyOffice/LibreOffice and set it to save in MSOffice file formats

>What version should I install?
W10 Enterprise IoT LTSC 2021
>Binary identical to Enterprise except no MS Store or apps
>Can install MS Store from cmd with: wsreset -i
>Alternatively use winget for apps
>Preinstalled with: Edge & Win32 system apps
>10 years support on "IoT LTSC", 5 for "LTSC"
>Manual version upgrades
IoT LTSC 2022: https://pastebin.com/rHcgvYS7

W11 Enterprise IoT LTSC 2024
>Same as W10 version except:
>UI written in React Native aka JavaScript including: Start, Taskbar and Explorer that lags even on i9s
>Use only if you fell for the 12th+ gen Intel meme and need the new CPU scheduler
>Wait for IoT LTSC 2027 if you can

W10/W11 Home/Pro/Education/Enterprise/Enterprise IoT
>Preinstalled with: Edge, Win32 system apps, MS Store, OneDrive, Weather, Movies, Music, Candy Crush, etc
>Auto-reinstalls apps on feature updates
>1.5-3 years support
>Forced version upgrades

>ISOs:
Windows IoT LTSC https://pastebin.com/ywkasnhM
Windows https://pastebin.com/nUMgAr0b
Office https://pastebin.com/G8w5qu6z

>Should I debloat / build my own ISO?
If you need to ask, then no.
If you know what you're doing:
https://pastebin.com/S5VKBirt

>Portable programs & reinstall-proofing
https://pastebin.com/Zh7WSbJ2

>Useful programs (new installs, essentials, utilities, adobe, etc)
https://pastebin.com/hN8nnwns

>I miss Windows##
OpenShell/RetroBar/WinClassic/StartIsBack


>LTSC Install Guides
https://rentry.org/windowsinstallguide
https://rentry.org/concisewin10
https://rentry.org/ltsc

https://rentry.org/fwtarchive

Previously on /fwt/: >>105129809

item.title: [ 49] Propaganda agency for Chief Retard acts retarded.
item.description:
https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/politics/the-white-house-posts-ai-generated-image-of-trump-as-a-buff-jedi-happy-may-the-4th-to-you-all/ar-AA1E9tx8?ocid=BingNewsSerp

The official White House X and Instagram accounts on Sunday posted an AI-generated image of Donald Trump as a beefed-up Jedi in celebration of "Star Wars" day.

The post read, "Happy May the 4th to all, including the Radical Left Lunatics who are fighting so hard to bring Sith Lords, Murderers, Drug Lords, Dangerous Prisoners, & well known MS-13 Gang Members, back into our Galaxy. You're not the Rebellion-you're the Empire. May the 4th be with you."

item.title: [ 34] Hey voyagers, The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread
item.description:
Hey voyagers,

The sticky probably needs to be updated, I'll keep the thread open for suggestions:

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

/trv/ is a slow board, so don't expect immediate responses. CHECK THE CATALOG – you might find threads already discussing topics you're interested in.

Before asking for suggestions, tell /trv/ about your:
>Budget
>Interests
>Level of understanding of the local language(s)
This makes it easier to give quality advice. Of course, keep your posts travel related.

For all other matters:
General culture questions >>>/int/
Politics discussion >>>/pol/
Transportation discussion >>>/n/
Outdoors-related discussion >>>/out/

For more information about safety, planning and other miscellaneous topics, check out the pastebin:

GENERAL INFO:
https://pastebin.com/yR1SAr3s

Note: Discussions of prostitution or sex tourism are not permitted on /trv/.

item.title: [157] Freediving / Spearfishing
item.description:
General thread for freediving and/or spearfishing, since I don't see one mentioning either.

My personal questions:
I've been thinking about taking a certification course so I can learn to do these things correctly and safely. I'm probably happy just doing the diving, but spearfishing seems like an easy and practical extension. I only casually skindive and rod-and-reel fish at the moment. Does anyone have experience taking such a course?
I know I'll need my own gear early on, but each instructor I can find seems to have their own equipment shops, so I imagine they wouldn't be impartial about the quality of other gear on the market. I live on the Pacific coast of the US, so I see that a 7 mm open cell wetsuit is strongly recommended. What good/bad features should I look out for on wetsuits and other equipment? For non-competitive diving, carbon fiber fins are almost certainly not worth the price, right?

Original filename: 1719043731130996.jpg
item.author: Anonymous
